TopicTitle: Copying and pasting, singly or in symmetry, of stock inventory containers should also duplicate their contents

Articles.Content: There is only so much re-clicking and refilling of inventory containers a person can take.  The challenge of KSP should be orbital mechanics and strategy, not fortitude in the face of grinding tedium
Yes! As a workaround I think you can add a filled container as a sub assembly but would need to double check.

yes!

the symmetry mode is the thing that is annyoing

I'm fairly sure that works with KAS inventory, but I think I tried that with stock and it was still foiled by placing in symmetry.    I want to be able to have kitted out containers ready to place en masse off the shelf.  Squad needs a new executive slot with the title "Chief Grindiness Reduction Officer"
